body.name: W&P Microwave Silicone Personal Popcorn Popper Maker | Charcoal | Collapsible Bowl w/Built In Measuring Cup, BPA Free, Eco-Friendly, Waste Free, 4 Cups of Popped Popcorn

FREE delivery February 29 - March 13 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: PERFECT PORTION: The Personal Popper pops up to 4 cups of fluffy popcorn — the same amount as a standard microwavable bag, at a fraction of the price!
WASTE-FREE: Farewell to plastic-wrapped, paper bags of microwave popcorn — this collapsible popcorn bowl provides the immediate satisfaction of microwave popcorn in an eco-friendly, waste-free format
COLLAPSIBLE DESIGN: Flatten the Popper to store it in the cupboard — but don’t worry, you’ll reach for it again in no time

NO TOOLS NEEDED: Flip the lid, which doubles as a measuring cup, to measure out kernels for a perfect serving of popcorn. Place kernels in the fully expanded popper bowl and microwave for 2 - 4 minutes. No oil necessary!
PREMIUM MATERIALS: Made from LFGB-certified silicone, which exceeds FDA standards of food safety
body.description: Can’t get enough of those crunchy kernels? Inspired by movie marathons and midnight snacks, This collapsible popcorn bowl provides The immediate satisfaction of microwave popcorn in an , waste-free format.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Product. Easy to use.
reviews.reviewText: This is by far my favorite way to make popcorn now. It pops up a great batch in 2 minutes and goes right in the dishwasher. I bought 3 more for holiday gifts!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What A Great Invention!
reviews.reviewText: I can't say enough good things about this. It folds up when you are not using it and it's easy to store. It make popcorn in the microwave with no oil- a gigantic plus. The popcorn is delicious and this is so easy to use. Clean up incredibly easy. Wish I found this years ago!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to store and makes good popcorn, but lid doesn't fit
reviews.reviewText: This washes great in the dishwasher and makes good popcorn. My complaint is the lid as it did NOT fit and that was really frustrating the first time. After just placing it on top, it worked okay and the popcorn popped enough to push it up anyway. Did watch the popcorn carefully after 2 minutes and it took maybe 15 seconds extra. Love the way it collapses to store. The bowl is too flimsy to eat out of but that was okay with us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Popcorn Lover's Dream: W&P Microwave Silicone Popper Maker
reviews.reviewText: The W&P Microwave Silicone Popper Maker in Black has become a kitchen favorite for its reliability and enjoyable popcorn experience. Having purchased it multiple times as gifts, I appreciate its conscious craftsmanship, crafted with 100% platinum silicone for safety and durability. The premium, LFGB certified silicone exceeds FDA standards, making it a secure and high-quality gift for clients, friends, and loved ones.This eco-conscious popcorn maker eliminates the need for plastic-wrapped, paper bags, providing immediate satisfaction with just kernels. It aligns with sustainability values, offering a waste-free format without exposing users to forever chemicals. The superb design eliminates the necessity for oil, providing a healthier alternative for popcorn enthusiasts. It has become my go-to for creating a delicious, chemical-free snack, especially when paired with Amish Country Popcorn or local varieties in the autumn. I highly recommend the W&P Microwave Silicone Popper Maker for an eco-friendly and delightful popcorn experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love it. Easy to clean, easy to use, easy to store. Air pops 9 cups of popped popcorn in 3 minutes. Tastes clean & delicious. Just add your favorite flavoring if desired. Because it is so simple to use & clean,I use it a lot so my snacking has been healthier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Used Daily - the best popcorn!
reviews.reviewText: I literally use this popper every single day. I buy the mushroom popcorn kernels and they are so tender and perfect. The lid lifts off with the larger popcorn. At the 30 second remainder point I take off the top and toss on a couple cubes of butter to melt during the final cook time. As others have said, the bowl gets very hot. I just grab with a dish towel. There are also some unpopped kernels but that is better than overcooking and burning.I used smaller "ladyfinger" kernels and those did slip through the holes on the measuring cup cap. They are also a little dense - smaller kernels = more kernels and less volume when popping. I would not recommend using that variety for this cooking method.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It works, but easy to burn popcorn if your not careful and not all the kernels pop... Feels wasteful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pops all the kernels and collapses for easy storage
reviews.reviewText: Makes a great gift for just about anyone. Raves all around.

reviews.reviewTitle: This broke my microwave oven on the very first batch.
reviews.reviewText: Just tried this popcorn maker out for the very first time and it broke my Microwave oven. 1 1/2 min in there were sparks flying around. After that a weird bright glow. My girlfriend and I were watching from across the kitchen honestly not knowing if the entire microwave (It's a new) was going to blow up. I heroically crossed the kitchen and opened the microwave oven and removed the brand new Christmas gift to find that there was now a pencil sized hole on the inside of the oven. A hole which was caused by such extreme heat that both plastic AND metal were burned straight through. The popcorn looked great though!

Seems to be decent quality and works as intended but thought it would be way bigger. It does say 4 cups however - so my mistake. Would have bought a different one if I had realized. If you are looking to make a bowl of popcorn for more than one person - this may not be the right item.
